text: Morning <@U0695UMTM2M> I'm so sorry to go off the radar! I've just started a new role so this fell to the bottom of my pile, just picking it back up again :see_no_evil:
I'll read through the thread and come back to you ASAP. Thanks again for your help, it's truly appreciated

Hi! :wave::skin-tone-3:

I have a problem with two workflow actions, I cannot delete them because there are users who are using them, however, I do not know who they are. Is it possible to know the portalId of the accounts that are using them?
unfortunately no this isn't possible, HubSpot use AWS Lambda for the custom coded actions so the IPs will change all the time
You can create a contact based list and use the workflow criteria to see who is actively still in the workflow still
I think it's a different ask Alex. Something to do with <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions|Custom Workflow Actions> I think.
